rainfall: Rainfall: 100 cm to 175 cm rainfall is ideal for sugarcane production
soil: It grows well in deep, well-drained soils of medium fertility of sandy loam soil textures with a pH range from 6.0 to 7.7.
irrigation: A crop requires 1500- 2500 mm of available water per year
sowing_time: In general January to march is the period of planting
maturity_time: It takes about 12 to 18 months to mature.
season: Best planted pre-monsoon, typically from February to March
seed_rate: On an average 36,000 three budded setts or 60 quintal of seed are sufficient for planting one hectare land area.
avg_yeild: The average yield of cane stalk is 60–70 tonnes per hectare
fertilizer: Apply P fertilizer based on soil test values. Otherwise apply super phosphate (375 kg/ha) along the furrows and incorporate with hand hoe.
pesticide: The insecticides acetamiprid and cypermethrin were used to manage aphids while four different insecticides controlled thrips. .
region: Most of the sugarcane is grown with the help of irrigation. Belgaum, Mandya, Mysore, Bijapur,Shimoga and Chitradurga are important producing districts.
special_feature: The plant is two to six metres (six to twenty feet) tall. All sugar cane species can interbreed and the major commercial cultivars are complex hybrids.
Location: Most of the sugarcane is grown with the help of irrigation. Belgaum, Mandya, Mysore, Bijapur,Shimoga and Chitradurga are important producing districts.

rainfall: For tobacco 50-100cm annual rainfall and 15-20o C temperature during growth period is ideal.
soil: Tobacco crop requires light to medium loam soil

sowing_time: The ideal months to plant tobacco are November and December
maturity_time: Usually matures and is ready for harvest 3 to 5 weeks after topping.
season: Primarily a Rabi crop, cultivated from October to March.

pesticide: Pyrethroid of the cyano pyrethroid are used as pesticide.
region: Suitable zone in Karnataka are Mysuru and Hassan.
special_feature: There is a promising way to convert tobacco leaves into pesticides with pyrolysis.
Location: Suitable zone in Karnataka are Mysuru and Hassan.

region: Suitable zone in Karnataka are West Coast Plains and Hills Region.
special_feature: White flowers, grey pubescence, yellow seed coat, black hilum, brown pods, determinate.
